ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISBLANK(Bank_name__c ), NOT(REGEX(Bank_name__c , "^[A-Z].*")), NOT(REGEX(Bank_name__c , "^[A-Za-z0-9 &.,'\\-]+$")), Bank_name__c != TRIM(Bank_name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bank Name must start with an uppercase letter and contain no leading/trailing spaces.
